channel.title: Quote on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Quote on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Quote: Barry L. Beyerstein, "The Brain and Consciousness: Implications for Psi Phenomena", The Skeptical Inquirer, Vol. XII No. 2, ppg. 163-171
item.description: Prevalent beliefs that knowledge can be tapped from previous incarnations or from a “universal mind” (the repository of all past wisdom and creativity) not only are implausible but also unfairly demean the stunning achievements of individual human brains.
